thread.section_title: Centauro Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Centauro Rent a Car | centauro.net
thread.title: Rosie
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por Rosie

author: Rosie
title: Rosie
text: I read lots of reviews regarding car hire for Murcia - we decided to go with Centauro - when we received the booking we were disappointed to see the car was kept off site and we would have to catch a bus to the office - we have no need to worry - they were waiting for us as we arrived and within 10 minutes we were driven to the office and were in our car driving off the forecourt - very slick service - the same for the drop off - we were back at the airport within 10 minutes. Would highly recommend - in fact we are using them again in July.
